issue.title: [Website] Distinguish emeritus members in governance page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15094](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15094). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, emeritus members are not marked as such in the governance page.
(see comment by `[~tlipcon]` at https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/172#pullrequestreview-828054027)

We should probably improve our `check_committers.py` script to look for emeritus members using the ASF's Web services.
